experience.description: I am currently conducting dataset pre-processing and building datasets for further analysis, applying AI methods to analyze datasets and derive insights, working on model performance analysis, implementing improvements and reviewing related scientific papers to stay updated with the latest research

Designed and developed an e-learning and e-shop platform using NextJS and TypeScript, collaborated with a team to deliver high-quality software solutions and contributed to the entire software development lifecycle, from requirements gathering to deployment

Developed a medical equipment e-commerce website, implemented responsive web design and optimized user interfaces using .Net Core 6 MVC and collaborated with cross-functional teams to deliver project milestones on time.
